item.description: Privacy Policy Last updated and effective: June 10, 2019 Privacy matters to us. If you have questions about any of the following information, please send an email to contact@representus.app and we will get back to you as soon as possible. RepresentUs was designed to provide users an easy way to stay up to date with actions taken by their Representatives in the United State Senate and House of Representatives. All data found in this application is taken directly or derived* from data collected from publicly available and official US Government sources.
